first.description: I like to design incredible products, {br} experiences and interfaces.
nd.title: My Projects
third.info: Senior UX/UI Designer currently developing experiences and interfaces for TV, Web and App. Due to my background is Industrial Design, I am specialized in product and experiences development focusing on Visual and Commercial Brand Strategy, User-Centered Design, Design Thinking, Prototyping, Testing and Research.
fourth.title: Let's work together!
fourth.sub: Let me take your project {br} to the next level.
